function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reduced physical activity during COVID-19 may lead to higher levels of loneliness, sadness, and anxiety.","Impact":"Increased risk of mental health issues and decreased overall well-being.","Mitigation":"Promote and support physical activity through targeted interventions and awareness campaigns.","Technologies":"Digital fitness platforms, virtual fitness classes, wearable fitness trackers.","People":"General population, individuals who have become inactive during the pandemic.","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies, fitness industry."},{"Description":"Gender differences in exercise behavior during the pandemic.","Impact":"Unequal access to the mental health benefits of physical activity for different gender groups.","Mitigation":"Design gender-specific exercise programs and interventions.","Technologies":"Fitness apps with tailored exercise programs, online fitness communities for specific gender groups.","People":"Male and female population.","Owner":"Fitness industry, mental health organizations."},{"Description":"Reduction in exercise behavior for male individuals during the pandemic.","Impact":"Increased risk of mental health issues and decreased overall well-being for males.","Mitigation":"Targeted outreach and support for male individuals to engage in physical activity.","Technologies":"Online fitness coaching, mental health support apps, virtual support groups.","People":"Male population.","Owner":"Mental health organizations, government agencies, fitness industry."}]}
